summary: The customer was unhappy with the service from Contoso Wireless and was angry that their internet had been down all day. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and assured the customer that they were doing their best to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. They also offered their appreciation for the customer's patience and understanding. The customer demanded a refund, but the agent explained that refunds were not available at this time, but offered to help with any other concerns or questions.
